Detailed Description

Root of the Caelum system. This class is the root of the Caelum system.
Author:
Jesús Alonso Abad
Version:
0.1

caelum::CaelumSystem::~CaelumSystem (   ) 
 

Destructor. Shuts down the system and detaches itself from the Ogre engine.

Remarks:
The model used in this system won't be deleted here.

void caelum::CaelumSystem::addListener (  CaelumListener *  listener  )

void caelum::CaelumSystem::setTotalDayTime (  const float  time  ) 
 

Sets the total day time. By default the total day time is stablished as 23h 59m 56s.

Parameters:
time The total day time in seconds (values lesser or equal than 0 will be set to the default day time).

Definition at line 118 of file CaelumSystem.cpp.

void caelum::CaelumSystem::setUpdateRate (  float  rate  ) 
 

Sets the updating rate. Allows to tell how much relative daytime [0, 1] can pass without being updated. For instance, in a 24hrs day, setting an update rate of 1/24 means that Caelum will update its state each hour.

Parameters:
rate The updating rate.
